org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb.process
Class AeXMLDBLogReader

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb.AeXMLDBObject
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb.AeAbstractXMLDBStorage
          org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb.process.AeXMLDBLogReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeXMLDBStorage
public class AeXMLDBLogReader
extends AeAbstractXMLDBStorage

Responsible for reading the log for a given process out of the XMLDB database. The log gets displayed in the admin console web page as well as the remote debugging console window so we don't want to return the entire log file if it's huge. Instead, we'll return a configurable head and tail portion of the log.
